content: I think I'll try to focus on buying the organic apples and carrots that are on sale this week at GreenMart, and see if I can combine those with some digital coupons or cashback offers. I also want to make sure to load the $5 off coupon I got from signing up for the rewards program last week onto my loyalty card. Do you think I should try to buy anything else while I'm at the store, or just stick to the items that are on sale?
